boardgame.name: Thunderstone Advance: Numenera
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The ancient evil known as Doom has decided to make a change. In this new world of Numenera, Doom has manifested as an intelligent virus that controls its hosts. The infected are known as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Doomladen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and they know each other regardless of a host's external form. They are lead by powerful beings with strange relics _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the Thunderstones _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and once again you must defeat them to save the world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the deck-building game Thunderstone Advance: Numenera, which can be played on its own or combined with other Thunderstone sets, you build a party of heroes to defeat the Thunderstone Bearers. The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Doomladen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mechanism introduced in this game unites various monster groups against you, and new Setting cards take you into the environment of Monte Cook's Numenera RPG._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: TGG Episode 55: Game Designer John Welch, Cheaty Mages, Cuba Libre, Numenera, Moonbase Alpha and More!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. THUNDERSTONE ADVANCE - NUMENERA: $37.95 Alderac Entertainment Group [AEG 5024] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5024) Doom was driven out of Tala. Defeated a second time, Doom sought out another world to conquer and a new method of doing so. It found the Ninth World, Numenera. Home to heroes and monsters unlike any seen before, Numenera plays host to Doom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s attempt to seize control by taking the form of a virus, infecting those now known as Doomladen. These creatures can be human, beasts, or monsters, but all recognize one another and their common master. Can the heroes survive when potentially anyone or anything could be a servant of Doom? Thunderstone Advance: Numenera takes the adventure of Thunderstone to the world of Monte Cook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Numenera. This set features creatures and heroes from the Numenera role-playing game, and expands your Thunderstone set with many new and exciting cards and abilities.
